titleStmt.title: Letters upon several occasions written by and between Mr. Dryden, Mr. Wycherly, Mr. ----, Mr. Congreve, and Mr. Dennis, published by Mr. Dennis with a new translation of select letters of Monsieur Voiture.
titleStmt.author: Dennis, John, 1657-1734.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
Wycherley, William, 1640-1716.
Congreve, William, 1670-1729.
Voiture, Monsieur de (Vincent), 1597-1648.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
